protocol.name: P-GSE33978-2
protocol.text: Seeds were imbibed at 22˚C or 4˚C for 24 hour.

protocol.name: P-GSE33978-3
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction from seeds was performed using a CTAB-based method according to Mukai Y, Yamamoto N (1997) DNA and RNA isolation method of woody plants. In: PCR Experimental Protocols for Plant (eds. Shimamoto K, Sasaki T), pp. 57-62. Shujunsha Co. Ltd, Tokyo.

protocol.name: P-GSE33978-4
text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 8 ug total RNA (Affymetrix_Genechip_Expression Analysis Technical Manual;

protocol.name: P-GSE33978-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 20 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE33978-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneArray Scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE33978-7
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Affymetrix GeneChip Operating Software (GCOS) 1.4 using default analysis settings
